sentences.sentence: He has sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people.
sentences.translation: 他派遣大批官员到这里骚扰我们的人民。

sentences.sentence: We've got a few small Green Peace boats that we harass the dumping ship with.
sentences.translation: 我们有几艘 Green Peace 的船只，用来侵扰那艘倾倒垃圾的船。

sentences.sentence: He will bring up your past to haunt and harass you.
sentences.translation: 他将带你回到从前，困扰和骚扰你。
